item.title: Free$^2$Guide: Gradient-Free Path Integral Control for Enhancing Text-to-Video Generation with Large Vision-Language Models
item.description: Free²Guide: Gradient-free path integral control enhances text-to-video generation using powerful large vision-language models, improving alignment without gradient-based fine-tuning.
